message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you great value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $16000?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $16200. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $15800?

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $16000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $16000. Would you be willing to consider $15900?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $16000, Bob. I've already made significant concessions and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $15950. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $15800. This is my final offer.
